content:
本件保存 年
司公力電灣台 TAIWAN POWER COMPANY 39 EAST HUO-PING ROAD SECTION I TAIPEI, TAIWAN, CHINA
CABLE ADDRESS: TAIPOWER
9-135
April 26, 1962
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for U. S. Aid Taipei
Subject: Surplus Property
Dear Mr. Chang:
We are in receipt of a letter reference MC-3440 dated April 25, 1962 from the Industrial Development Division of AID/China advising that surplus drill bits as indicated in the attached list are available from Japan. These equipment would be most useful at our Kukuan Project.
140.112.213.82
Please process requisition of these equipment for us and at a NT$ cost to cover freight and handling.
Yours very truly, TAIWAN POWER COMPANY
Z .K. Chen
L. K. Chen Vice President & Chief Engr.
51.4. 27 08255 VO.
54.
2
CUSA
ENCL: 1
KNW/cph cc: Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/c
國史饭 Academia Historica

paragraphs.content: 司公力電灣台 TAIWAN POWER COMPANY 39 EAST HUO-PING ROAD SECTION I TAIPEI, TAIWAN, CHINA
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for U. S. Aid Taipei

We are in receipt of a letter reference MC-3440 dated April 25, 1962 from the Industrial Development Division of AID/China advising that surplus drill bits as indicated in the attached list are available from Japan. These equipment would be most useful at our Kukuan Project.
Please process requisition of these equipment for us and at a NT$ cost to cover freight and handling.
Yours very truly, TAIWAN POWER COMPANY
L. K. Chen Vice President & Chief Engr.
KNW/cph cc: Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/c
